thoughts.text: The file permissions for the 'cryptocurrency_data_filtered.csv' file are set to read-only. I will use the 'execute_shell' command to change the file permissions to read-write.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the 'execute_shell' command to change the file permissions to read-write, I can ensure that the file can be read and modified as needed. This will help me to inspect the contents of the file and identify any formatting issues.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to change the file permissions to read-write
- Use the 'read_file' command to inspect the contents of the file again
- Identify any formatting issues
- Determine the best course of action to resolve the issue
